Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary piece holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this masterpiece to you at a special price of $750000, aiming to provide you with an exceptional opportunity to own something truly remarkable. We believe its unique features and craftsmanship make it a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
